titleStmt.title: Variants of the bound pronoun 2nd person singular masculine after a vowel
titleStmt.author: Veronika Engler

sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for the 2nd person singular masculine bound pronoun after a vowel.

revisionDesc.change: For EGY-___ there are no values found

wib:featureValueObservation.note: /-č/ is attested in the villages alongside /-k/
